definition: Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform

sentences.english: Arriving in Hong Kong's old Kai Tak airport, he was met by local colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 到达香港启德机场后，当地同行前来迎接。

sentences.english: Kai Tak Airport in Hong Kong, China, has a good security system.
sentences.chinese: 中国香港的启德机场具有良好的安全系统。

sentences.english: For 73 years, Kai Tak airport greeted visitors from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 启德机场73年来迎接来自世界各地的观光客。

sentences.english: Fig. 16 A transmissometer alongside the runway at Kai Tak.
sentences.chinese: 图16启德机场跑道旁的视程透射表。
